Package permafrost.tundra.data.transform.string

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Blankifier
    Converts all null values to empty strings.
    Capitalizer
    Capitalizes the first character in either the first word or all words in the String elements in an IData document or IData[] document list.
    Condenser
    Replaces runs of whitespace with a single space in String elements in an IData document or IData[] document list.
    Legalizer
    Converts illegal characters to underscores to create legal Java identifiers.
    Lowercaser
    Converts String elements to lowercase in an IData document or IData[] document list.
    Nullifier
    Converts all string values that only contain whitespace characters to null.
    Prefixer
    Adds a given prefix to string elements in an IData document or IData[] document list.
    Replacer
    Replaces either the first or all occurrences of the given regular expression with the given replacement.
    Slicer
    Slices a section from String elements in an IData document or IData[] document list.
    Splitter
    Splits strings using a given regular expression pattern.
    Squeezer
    Squeezes whitespace from elements in an IData document or IData[] document list.
    Stringifier
    Converts all non-string values to strings
    Suffixer
    Adds a given suffix to string elements in an IData document or IData[] document list.
    Translator
    Translates an input value to an output value using a translation table.
    Trimmer
    Trims whitespace from elements in an IData document or IData[] document list.
    Truncator
    Truncates strings to the given length.
    Uncontroller
    Removes ISO control characters from all String elements in an IData document or IData[] document list.
    Unprefixer
    Removes a given prefix from string elements in an IData document or IData[] document list.
    Unsuffixer
    Removes a given suffix from string elements in an IData document or IData[] document list.
    Uppercaser
    Converts String elements to uppercase in an IData document or IData[] document list.
